name: In re ESTATE of Charles W. ROSS, Deceased. Appeal of Emma A. ROSS, Administrator of the Estate of Charles W. Ross, Deceased

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Charles W. ROSS, Deceased. Appeal of Emma A. ROSS, Administrator of the Estate of Charles W. Ross, Deceased.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Anthony J. Kovach, Uniontown, for appellant.
Stephen J. Harris, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
364 A.2d 664
In re ESTATE of Charles W. ROSS, Deceased. Appeal of Emma A. ROSS, Administrator of the Estate of Charles W. Ross, Deceased.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 21, 1976.
Decided Oct. 20, 1976.
Anthony J. Kovach, Uniontown, for appellant.
Stephen J. Harris, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and MANDERINO, JJ.
